AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.label: Astra Miliatrum Armour Patch
AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.tooltip: Removes the Astra Militarum versions of dupped Armour when active

AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.label: Astra Miliatrum Weapons Patch
AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.tooltip: Removes the Astra Militarum versions of dupped Weapons when active

AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.label: Imperial Components Patch
AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.tooltip: Replace some of the materials required in recipes with those from the Astra Militarum or Legiones Astartes mods if present.

AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.label: Vanilia Pirate Expansion
AdeptusMechanicus.PatchDescriptionDef.tooltip: Adds Pawnkinds with access to imperial and chaos weaponry to the Pirate Faction.
